title: Galle Road Frontage land for sale - 230 perches, excellent investment opportunity
details:
REDUCED FOR QUICK SALE
230 perches of prime land in Waskaduwa (Kalutara District), nestling with Galle Road frontage and extending up to a few yards from the railway tracks (in the back) for sale or lease in full or in part;
- ideally suited for business or investment opportunity
- bustling tourist area, within a few yards from the 5* Citrus Hotel
- clear title and deeds

Genuine direct buyers only, please contact:
dj_inter@sltnet.lk;

Telephone: Sri Lanka 0094773114965
0094766068441
UK: 00447931286478
